text: Kinva ekhadi asi vastu, ji tumacya manata atisaya mahana vatata asela. Maga tyanni vicarave ki asa kona ahe, jo dusaryanda amace jivana parata karela? Tumhi uttara dya ki toca (allaha) jyane tumhala pahilya khepesa nirmana kele. Yavara te apale doke halavuna tumhala vicaratila ki, bare he kevha ghaduna ye'ila? Tara tumhi uttara dya ki navala navhe ki te lavakaraca ghaduna ye'ila
